fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 154.12 lakh crore compared with Rs 114.70 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 shed 73.10 points or 0.42% to settle at 17,392.70. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, fell 2.18% to 13.8750. Adani Enterprises, Reliance Industries (RIL) and HDFC Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The March 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 March 2023.
